iighty well it started off not good cuz i wuz late lol but we got there nd then we left ..it took FOREVER 2 get 2 hershey nd i wuz so borrrred ..but ne wais we got there eventually nnnnd then ya i didnt go on ne rides except for 2 haha wut a waste ov money ..but i had an overall good tyme (except wen i had 2 wait 2 hours all by myself y they stood in line 4 a freakin 20second ride ..but i got over it lol) so0o ya then on the bus ryde home my head wuz freakin killin me nd i koodnt even fall asleep cuz i didnt have ne medicine i kood take 2 make it feel better ..ughh it wuz the worst buuuuut wen i got home i went on the computer reel quik 2 say goodnyte 2 davey nd then took sum tylenol pm nd went ryte 2 sleep ...i love that stuf lol ..but ne wais ya so i gues that wuz prety much it iightys wel im guna go now byyyyyez haaaa u noe u love it davey!! haha nd u noe their better! ;)

ha these things r the koolest ever lol.... You're Element is Fire. You have a strong, independant, fiery personality and you obviously don't ley other's puch you around. You like being in charge and don't care what other people think. In fact, you like to stand out and be yourself. You're probably shy when people first meet you but your a ball of energy that could explode at any given moment. You like to laugh and whether you admit it or not, you like to fight. You're peronality that is wild and untamable. You're beauty is physically fit and a little sexy and you have a very pretty face. urlLink What's Your Element(girls)? saturday_ hmm..wel i got up nd evry1 was gone ..i was suposed 2 go 2 my moms but they didnt wait 4 me haha ..ne wais hm i pretty much just sat around all day ..then at lyke 7 i think davey kame nd got me nd his dad let him drive! lol kant wait till he gets his license ..ne wais so we went to the mall nd davey actually bought 2pairs of shorts nd a shirt ..i was so0o0 proud ha then we walked around a little more so we walked across the street 2 i duno toys r us but we didnt go in lol thennn we walked ovr 2 sum uthr plaza nd davey showed me his "store" hahaha funnest ever "i love ___ ___ ___ ___" (ha dave i thought i shood block it out) ne wais thennn we walked bak ovr 2 the mall nd gues hoo we saw!!! kc!! lol so we talked 2 her 4 a little bit but then it was tyme to go so my granmom kame nd got us nd we brought davey home nd then i kame home nd thats all yesterday_ umm yesterdai wasnt very exciting i went 2 church then kame home nd ate pizza lol thennn me nd jade took a nap nd then my uncle nd maggie kame ovr wit the babie nd we talked 2 them nd gave my uncle his fathers day presents ..thennn they left nd i was bored again ..then my granmom kame home nnnnd i begged her 2 take me down the street 2 the water ice place since she wouldnt let me walk ? haha i duno so then she brought me nd i got WATERMELON! my fave.! lol thennn davey kalled me nd i talked 2 him 4 a while nd then went 2 sleepy =) the end.

..wel ryte now ne way lol ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I’ve been waiting all day for ya babe so won’t you come sit and talk to me and tell me how we’re gonna be together always hope you know that when this late at night I hold on to a pillow tight and think about how you promised me forever I never thought that anyone could make me feel this way now that you’re here boy all I want is just a chance to say get out (leave) right now it’s the end of you and me it’s too late (now) and I can’t wait for you to be gone cause I know about her (move) and I wonder (why) how I bought all the lies you said that you would treat me right but you was just a waste of time tell me why you looking so confused when I’m the one that didn’t know the truth how could you ever be so cold? to go behind my back and call my friend boy you must’ve fallin and bumped your head because you left your number on her phone so now that after all that you’ve said and done maybe I’m the one to blame but to think the one that you could be the one well it didn’t work out that way get out (leave) right now it’s the end of you and me it’s too late (now) and I can’t wait for you to be gone cause I know about her (move) and I wonder (why) how I bought all the lies you said that you would treat me right but you was just a waste of time I wanted you right here with me but I have no choice you’ve got to leave because my heart is breaking with every word I’m saying, I gave up everything I had on something that just wouldnt last but I refuse to cry no tears will fall from these eyes get out get out (leave) right now it’s the end of you and me it’s too late (now) and I can’t wait for you to be gone cause I know about her (move) and I wonder (why) how I bought all the lies you said that you would treat me right but you was just a waste of time ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ lol k das all i wanted ta do

LAST DAY OF SKOOOL!! WOO HOOO! lol k wellll i got up this mornin did ma hurr nd stuf thennnn we didnt realy do nuthin at skool except the ceremony thing ..omg proudest ever of nicholas that he won allll those awards!=) lol nnne wais aftr that we went 2 rachie's nd went swimmin then we ate hotdogs! lol thennnn we went bak in the pool ..aftr that i went nd got changed nd ate more! haha hmm then evry1 else left except me nd nick nd we went on the comp. 4 a litle bit ..then we went nd layed on the trampoline nd talked talked talked! sweetest ever! =) then we went 2 yg nd jess wuz bein the meenest ever haha thennn nicholas left nd i wuz the saddest lol then i went bak 2 rachie's nd my granpop picked me up now im home! =) k wel i gues thats all love yaaaas xOxO des* o ya i did this koolest ever "which jack-o-lantern are you quiz" thingy even tho its not even near halloween haha how embarassing 4 me but o wel ha k here it is.... discover your jack-o-lantern face @ quiz me
